name: Spooky Rogue
description:
Spooky Rogue is a rogue like game where you have to defeat the enemies to reach the more score you can.

Controls:

It's preferable to play with gamepad.

  • Use A to jump
  • Use X to make a physical attack
  • Use Y to make a magical attack
  • And use the D-Pad to move

Keyboard controls:

  • Use C to jump
  • Use X to make a physical attack
  • Use Z to make a magical attack
  • And use the arrow keys to move

This game was originally made for Gentle Ghost Jam by:

  • Eacrow
  • Flamaroth (Bandcamp)
